entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
